BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.ComboBoxEvents<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.ComboBoxEvents<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: OnActionBegin
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked before fetching data from the data source.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnActionComplete
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked after data is fetched suction from the data source.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnActionFailure
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the data fetch request fails.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnOpen
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the dropdown popup before it opens. Prevent the dropdown popup open action using . @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; public void OnOpenHandler(BeforeOpenEventArgs args) { args.Cancel = true; } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Blur
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the ComboBox component loses focus.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the property changed. This event triggers when an item in a popup is selected or when the user changes the model value. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; public void OnChange(Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.ChangeEventArgs args) { var NewValue = args.Value; } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnClose
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked before the dropdown popup is closed. Prevent the dropdown popup close action using and the popup remains opened always. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; public void OnCloseHandler(PopupEventArgs args) { args.Cancel = true; } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Created
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the component is created.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: CustomValueSpecifier
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when custom values (not present in the data source) are selected in the ComboBox component. @code{ public class Countries { public string Name { get; set; } public int Code { get; set; } } private List CountryList = new List() { new Countries(){ Code= 101, Name= "Australia" }, new Countries(){ Code= 102, Name= "Canada" } } private void customValue(CustomValueSpecifierEventArgs args) { args.Item = new Countries() { Code = 103, Name = args.Text }; } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataBound
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the data source is populated in the popup list.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Destroyed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the component is destroyed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Filtering
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked on typing a character in the ComboBox. Prevent the default filter action and make your query enable the event argument, and pass the modified data source and query in the method. @code{ SfComboBox ComboBoxObj { get; set; } protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; public async Task OnFilteringHandler(FilteringEventArgs args) { args.PreventDefaultAction = true; var query = new Query().Where(new WhereFilter() { Field = "Text", Operator = "contains", value = args.Text, IgnoreCase = true }); await ComboBoxObj.FilterAsync(MyList, query); } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Focus
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the component is the focus.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Opened
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when the dropdown popup opens.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Closed
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked after the dropdown popup has been closed.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnValueSelect
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked when an item is selected from the dropdown popup by the user either with a mouse tap or with a keyboard navigation. Prevent the item selection action using . @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; public void OnSelectHandler(SelectEventArgs args) { if(args.ItemData== "Medium") args.Cancel = true; } } ]]>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfComboBox<TValue, TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The ComboBox component allows the user to type a value or choose an option from the list of predefined options.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TValue">The type of value that will be selected or entered in the ComboBox.</typeparam>
            <typeparam name="TItem">The type of items that will be displayed in the ComboBox dropdown list.</typeparam>
            <summary>
            The ComboBox component allows the user to type a value or choose an option from the list of predefined options.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfComboBox<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfComboBox<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowCustom
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox allows custom values to be entered.
            </summary>
            <value>
              <c>true</c> if custom values are allowed the user to enter a value that does not exist in the data source; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Autofill
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox automatically fills the input with the first matched item while typing.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if autofill is enabled; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowClearButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox should display a clear button to clear the selected value.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the clear button is visible; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
             When you click the clear button, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" />, and <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Index" /> properties are reset to <c>null</c>. This allows users to easily clear the selected value and start fresh.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidateOnInput
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox should perform validation when input is entered.
            </summary>
            <value>

            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFiltering
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the filtering option is enabled or not. true, if the filtering option is enabled and show the filter bar (search box) in the pop-up; otherwise, false.The default value is false. The filter action retrieves the matched items using the event based on the characters typed in the search textbox.

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a CSS class string to customize the appearance of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the right-to-left direction is enabled or not for the drop-down list component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for dropdown list component. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListEvents`2" /> component. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the Dropdown list component is enabled; otherwise, it is disabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to <c>true</c>, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property is persisted.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Component's <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterBarPlaceholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the filter textbox has no text and removes the focus.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The text that is displayed when the filter text box has no text. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property value is updated only when the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.AllowFiltering" /> is enabled.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FloatLabelType
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the floating label behavior of the dropdown list. The text act as a lable. One of the enumeration. The default value is If the FloatLabelType is Never, the placeholder text does not float as a label. If the FloatLabelType is Auto, the placeholder text will float above the DropDownList component as a label after focusing it. If the FloatLabelType is Always, the placeholder text is displayed as a label above the DropDownList component. In the following code example, set the float lable as Auto. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the footer container of the pop-up list. The template content. The default value in null. Total list items: 3 @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the header container of the popup list. The template content. The default value in null. T-shirt size @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes such as styles, class, and more that will be applied to the dropdown list element. The value as dictionary collection.The default value is null Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; Dictionary CustomAttribute = new Dictionary() { { "title", "Select T-shirt size" } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:

            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes such as disabled, value, and more that will be applied to the dropdown list input element.

            </value>

            If you configured both the property and equivalent input attribute, then the component considers the property value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Index
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the dropdown list component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The index of the selected items in the list. The default value is <c>null</c> which indicates that nothing is selected.
            </value>
            <exception cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException">The index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list at the time the list is rendered.</exception>
            <remarks>
            Use this property to determine the index of the currently selected item in the list if the dropdown list component allows only one selection.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: IndexChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the callback to trigger when the index changes.
            </summary>
            <value>

            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the dropdown list has no value and remove on the focus.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The text that is displayed when the dropdown list has no value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The property depends on the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.FloatLabelType" /> property, The placeholder text acts as a label.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: PopupHeight
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the height of the popup list.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred height of the popup list in pixels or percentage of the dropdown list. The default value is <c>300px</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property accepts pixels or percentage value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: PopupWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the width of the popup list. By default, the popup width sets based on the width of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred width of the popup list in pixels or percentage of the dropdown list. The default value is <c>100%</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property accepts pixels or percentage value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Readonly
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> is in read-only mode or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the dropdown list is in read-only mode; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            In read-only mode, the dropdown list popup can not be opened on click.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableVirtualization
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>

            </summary>

            </value>
            <remarks>

            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortOrder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Specifies the `SortOrder` to sort the data source.</para>
            <para>The available type of sort orders are.</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>The data source is not sorting.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Ascending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with ascending order.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Descending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with descending order.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The order of sorting the list items. The default value is <c>SortOrder.None</c>. 
            </value>

            </value>

            </value>

            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreAccent

            </value>

TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            The ComboBox component allows the user to type a value or choose an option from the list of predefined options.
            </summary>
            <typeparam name="TValue">The type of value that will be selected or entered in the ComboBox.</typeparam>
            <typeparam name="TItem">The type of items that will be displayed in the ComboBox dropdown list.</typeparam>
            <summary>
            The ComboBox component allows the user to type a value or choose an option from the list of predefined options.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowCustom
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox allows custom values to be entered.
            </summary>
            <value>
              <c>true</c> if custom values are allowed the user to enter a value that does not exist in the data source; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Autofill
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox automatically fills the input with the first matched item while typing.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if autofill is enabled; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowClearButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox should display a clear button to clear the selected value.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the clear button is visible; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
             When you click the clear button, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" />, and <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Index" /> properties are reset to <c>null</c>. This allows users to easily clear the selected value and start fresh.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValidateOnInput
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ComboBox should perform validation when input is entered.
            </summary>
            <value>

            <remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortOrder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Specifies the `SortOrder` to sort the data source.</para>
            <para>The available type of sort orders are.</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>The data source is not sorting.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Ascending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with ascending order.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Descending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with descending order.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The order of sorting the list items. The default value is <c>SortOrder.None</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreCase

            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreAccent

<summary>

BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the event callback that will be invoked before the dropdown popup is close. BoundAttributes.Name: GroupBy
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets filed names to display the list in category-wise. Accepts a string value. The default value is String.Empty. @code{ public class Vegetables { public string ID { get; set; } public string Name { get; set; } public string Category { get; set; } } List VegetablesList = new List { new Vegetables { Name = "Cabbage", Category = "Leafy and Salad", ID = "item1" }, new Vegetables { Name = "Chickpea", Category = "Beans", ID = "item2" }, new Vegetables { Name = "Green bean", Category = "Beans", ID = "item4" }, new Vegetables { Name = "Spinach", Category = "Leafy and Salad", ID = "item9" } }; } ]]>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList<TValue, TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation: The DropDownList component allows users to select a single value that is non-editable from a list of predefined values. In the following code example, a basic DropDownList component is initialized with simple list items. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]> The DropDownList component contains a list of predefined values from which a single value can be chosen. The DropDownList component contains a list of predefined values from which a single value can be chosen. Specifies the value type. Specifies the type of SfDropDownList.

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ID
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the unique identifier for <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListEvents`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            Accepts a string value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            You can specify only unique value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the content that has to be passed.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueExpression
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets an expression that identifies the bound value in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListEvents`2" /> component.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFiltering
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the filtering option is enabled or not. true, if the filtering option is enabled and show the filter bar (search box) in the pop-up; otherwise, false.The default value is false. The filter action retrieves the matched items using the event based on the characters typed in the search textbox.

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a CSS class string to customize the appearance of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            Accepts a CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the right-to-left direction is enabled or not for the drop-down list component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for dropdown list component. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListEvents`2" /> component. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the Dropdown list component is enabled; otherwise, it is disabled. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to <c>true</c>, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property is persisted.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Component's <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterBarPlaceholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the filter textbox has no text and removes the focus.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The text that is displayed when the filter text box has no text. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property value is updated only when the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.AllowFiltering" /> is enabled.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FloatLabelType
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the floating label behavior of the dropdown list. The text act as a lable. One of the enumeration. The default value is If the FloatLabelType is Never, the placeholder text does not float as a label. If the FloatLabelType is Auto, the placeholder text will float above the DropDownList component as a label after focusing it. If the FloatLabelType is Always, the placeholder text is displayed as a label above the DropDownList component. In the following code example, set the float lable as Auto. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the footer container of the pop-up list. The template content. The default value in null. Total list items: 3 @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the header container of the popup list. The template content. The default value in null. T-shirt size @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes such as styles, class, and more that will be applied to the dropdown list element. The value as dictionary collection.The default value is null Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; Dictionary CustomAttribute = new Dictionary() { { "title", "Select T-shirt size" } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes such as disabled, value, and more that will be applied to the dropdown list input element.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The value as dictionary collection. The default value is <c>null</c>
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If you configured both the property and equivalent input attribute, then the component considers the property value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Index
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the dropdown list component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The index of the selected items in the list. The default value is <c>null</c> which indicates that nothing is selected.
            </value>
            <exception cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException">The index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list at the time the list is rendered.</exception>
            <remarks>
            Use this property to determine the index of the currently selected item in the list if the dropdown list component allows only one selection.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: IndexChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the callback to trigger when the index changes.
            </summary>
            <value>
            An event callback function.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the dropdown list has no value and remove on the focus.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The text that is displayed when the dropdown list has no value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The property depends on the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.FloatLabelType" /> property, The placeholder text acts as a label.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: PopupHeight
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the height of the popup list.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred height of the popup list in pixels or percentage of the dropdown list. The default value is <c>300px</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property accepts pixels or percentage value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: PopupWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the width of the popup list. By default, the popup width sets based on the width of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred width of the popup list in pixels or percentage of the dropdown list. The default value is <c>100%</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property accepts pixels or percentage value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Readonly
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> is in read-only mode or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the dropdown list is in read-only mode; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            In read-only mode, the dropdown list popup can not be opened on click.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowClearButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show or hide the clear button in the dropdown list. It helps to clear the selected value of a dropdown list on user intraction.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if show the clear button in the dropdown list; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            When the clear button is clicked, <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" />, and <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Index" /> properties are reset to null.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableVirtualization
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the virtual scrolling is enabled or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the virtual scrolling for dropdown list; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            To improve performance, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.EnableVirtualization" /> property is set to <c>true</c>. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemsCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of items to be fetched in the popup when the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.EnableVirtualization" /> property is enabled.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The number of list items to be fetched in dropdown list component. The default value is <c>5</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the value of the selected item in the dropdown list component. This will be used with two-way binding.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The value of the selected item in the dropdown list component. The default is <c>null</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Use the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property to specify or determine the value displayed in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback that trigger when the value changes.
            </summary>
            <value>
            An event callback function.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the selected list item in the input element of the component. The template content. The default value in null. T-shirt size - @(context) @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the width of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred width of the dropdown list in pixels or percentage value. The default value is <c>100%</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: TabIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the location of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component in the tab order.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The numeric index of the dropdown list in the tab order. The default value is <c>0</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the content of input has changed and gets focus-out.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: OnInput
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers each time when the value of input has changed.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: OnBlur
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the input loses the focus.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: OnFocus
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the input gets focus.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to each list item present in the popup.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: GroupTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to the group headers present in the popup list.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: NoRecordsTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to popup list of component, when no data is available on the component.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ActionFailureTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template and assigns it to the popup list content of the component, when the data fetch request from the remote server fails.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortOrder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Specifies the `SortOrder` to sort the data source.</para>
            <para>The available type of sort orders are.</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>The data source is not sorting.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Ascending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with ascending order.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Descending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with descending order.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The order of sorting the list items. The default value is <c>SortOrder.None</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Gets or sets the list items either through local or remote service and binds it to the component.</para>
            <para>It can be an array of JSON Objects or an instance of `DataManager`.</para>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            Binding data to the popup element. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Query
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the external `Query` that execute along with data processing.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            Query value to be used for data fetching. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterType
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets which filter type, the component needs to be considered on search action.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The filter type specifed for searching the list items. The default value is <c>FilterType.StartsWith</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreCase
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether case-sensitivity is enabled or disabled when searching for suggestions.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>false</c>, consider the `case-sensitive` on performing the search to find suggestions. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreAccent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether diacritic characters or accents are ignored.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, ignores the diacritic characters or accents when filtering. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ZIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the z-index value of the component popup element.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The ZIndex value for the popup element.The default value is <c>1000</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether the right-to-left direction is enabled or not for the drop-down list component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the right to left direction is enabled for dropdown list component. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
             Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.DropDownListEvents`2" /> component. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the Dropdown list component is enabled; otherwise, it is disabled. The default value is <c>false</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether to persist component's state between page reloads. When set to <c>true</c>, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property is persisted.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the component's state persistence is enabled. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Component's <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property will be stored in browser local storage to persist component's state when page reloads.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterBarPlaceholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the filter textbox has no text and removes the focus.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The text that is displayed when the filter text box has no text. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property value is updated only when the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.AllowFiltering" /> is enabled.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FloatLabelType
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the floating label behavior of the dropdown list. The text act as a lable. One of the enumeration. The default value is If the FloatLabelType is Never, the placeholder text does not float as a label. If the FloatLabelType is Auto, the placeholder text will float above the DropDownList component as a label after focusing it. If the FloatLabelType is Always, the placeholder text is displayed as a label above the DropDownList component. In the following code example, set the float lable as Auto. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: FooterTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the footer container of the pop-up list. The template content. The default value in null. Total list items: 3 @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HeaderTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the header container of the popup list. The template content. The default value in null. T-shirt size @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes such as styles, class, and more that will be applied to the dropdown list element. The value as dictionary collection.The default value is null Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying @attributes directive. @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; Dictionary CustomAttribute = new Dictionary() { { "title", "Select T-shirt size" } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: InputAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a collection of additional attributes such as disabled, value, and more that will be applied to the dropdown list input element.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The value as dictionary collection. The default value is <c>null</c>
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If you configured both the property and equivalent input attribute, then the component considers the property value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Index
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the dropdown list component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The index of the selected items in the list. The default value is <c>null</c> which indicates that nothing is selected.
            </value>
            <exception cref="T:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException">The index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list at the time the list is rendered.</exception>
            <remarks>
            Use this property to determine the index of the currently selected item in the list if the dropdown list component allows only one selection.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: IndexChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the callback to trigger when the index changes.
            </summary>
            <value>
            An event callback function.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Placeholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the text that is displayed when the dropdown list has no value and remove on the focus.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The text that is displayed when the dropdown list has no value. The default value is <c>String.Empty</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The property depends on the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.FloatLabelType" /> property, The placeholder text acts as a label.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: PopupHeight
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the height of the popup list.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred height of the popup list in pixels or percentage of the dropdown list. The default value is <c>300px</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property accepts pixels or percentage value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: PopupWidth
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the width of the popup list. By default, the popup width sets based on the width of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred width of the popup list in pixels or percentage of the dropdown list. The default value is <c>100%</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            This property accepts pixels or percentage value.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Readonly
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> is in read-only mode or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the dropdown list is in read-only mode; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            In read-only mode, the dropdown list popup can not be opened on click.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowClearButton
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show or hide the clear button in the dropdown list. It helps to clear the selected value of a dropdown list on user intraction.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if show the clear button in the dropdown list; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            When the clear button is clicked, <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" />, and <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Index" /> properties are reset to null.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableVirtualization
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the virtual scrolling is enabled or not.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the virtual scrolling for dropdown list; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            To improve performance, the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.EnableVirtualization" /> property is set to <c>true</c>. 
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemsCount
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the number of items to be fetched in the popup when the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.EnableVirtualization" /> property is enabled.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The number of list items to be fetched in dropdown list component. The default value is <c>5</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets the value of the selected item in the dropdown list component. This will be used with two-way binding.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The value of the selected item in the dropdown list component. The default is <c>null</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Use the <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2.Value" /> property to specify or determine the value displayed in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a callback that trigger when the value changes.
            </summary>
            <value>
            An event callback function.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the customised design content and assigns it to the selected list item in the input element of the component. The template content. The default value in null. T-shirt size - @(context) @code{ protected List MyList = new List() { "Small", "Medium", "Large" }; } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Width
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the width of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The preferred width of the dropdown list in pixels or percentage value. The default value is <c>100%</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: TabIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the location of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfDropDownList`2" /> component in the tab order.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The numeric index of the dropdown list in the tab order. The default value is <c>0</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: OnChange
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the content of input has changed and gets focus-out.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: OnInput
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers each time when the value of input has changed.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: OnBlur
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the input loses the focus.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: OnFocus
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Triggers when the input gets focus.
            </summary>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to each list item present in the popup.
            </summary>
            <value>

            </value>

            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortOrder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Specifies the `SortOrder` to sort the data source.</para>
            <para>The available type of sort orders are.</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>The data source is not sorting.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Ascending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with ascending order.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Descending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with descending order.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The order of sorting the list items. The default value is <c>SortOrder.None</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Gets or sets the list items either through local or remote service and binds it to the component.</para>
            <para>It can be an array of JSON Objects or an instance of `DataManager`.</para>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            Binding data to the popup element. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Query
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the external `Query` that execute along with data processing.
            </summary>
            <value>

            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterType
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets which filter type, the component needs to be considered on search action.
            </summary>

            The filter type specifed for searching the list items. The default value is <c>FilterType.StartsWith</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreCase
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether case-sensitivity is enabled or disabled when searching for suggestions.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>false</c>, consider the `case-sensitive` on performing the search to find suggestions. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreAccent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether diacritic characters or accents are ignored.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, ignores the diacritic characters or accents when filtering. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ZIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the z-index value of the component popup element.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The ZIndex value for the popup element.The default value is <c>1000</c>.
            </value>

The below code example, showcases a component with fiels settings option. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: GroupBy
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the name of the field used to group the items in the . The below code example, showcases a component with grouping. @code { public List VegetableData = new List { new VegetableDetail{ Vegetable = "Cabbage", Category = "Leafy and Salad", Id = "item1" }, new VegetableDetail{ Vegetable = "Spinach", Category = "Leafy and Salad", Id = "item2" }, new VegetableDetail{ Vegetable = "Chickpea", Category = "Beans", Id = "item6" }, new VegetableDetail{ Vegetable = "Green bean", Category = "Beans", Id = "item7" }, new VegetableDetail{ Vegetable = "Garlic", Category = "Bulb and Stem", Id = "item9" }, new VegetableDetail{ Vegetable = "Nopal", Category = "Bulb and Stem", Id = "item10" } }; public class VegetableDetail { public string Vegetable { get; set; } public string Category { get; set; } public string Id { get; set; } } } ]]>

TagHelpers.Documentation: Specifies the selection settings such as CheckboxPosition, Mode, ShowCheckBox, and ShowSelectAll in the . The below code example, showcases a component with selection settings option. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: CheckboxPosition
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the position of a checkbox in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.CheckBoxPosition" /> enumeration. The default value is <c>Left</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>CheckBoxPosition</c> is <c>Left</c>, the checkbox will be placed left to the content of the list item.
            If the <c>CheckBoxPosition</c> is <c>Right</c>, the checkbox will be placed right to the content of the list item.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Mode
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the mode of selection in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SelectionMode" /> enumeration. The default value is <c>Multiple</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>SelectionMode</c> is <c>Single</c>, allows single selection.
            If the <c>SelectionMode</c> is <c>Multiple</c>, alloes multiple selection.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowCheckbox
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the checkbox selection in <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, if the checkbox selection is enabled for <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ShowSelectAll
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to enable or disable the select all option in . true, if the select all checkbox option is enabled for . The default value is false. This property will take into effect once the ShowCheckBox property is true. The below code example, showcases a component with selection settings option. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.ListBoxToolbarSettings
TagHelpers.Documentation:
<summary>
            Specifies the toolbar settings like toolbar items and the toolbar position in a <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: Items
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates the list of toolbar items used for moving items in a same or different . The predefined tools are 'MoveUp', 'MoveDown', 'MoveTo', 'MoveFrom', 'MoveAllTo', and 'MoveAllFrom'. The options such as 'MoveTo', 'MoveFrom', 'MoveAllTo', and 'MoveAllFrom' are only used to transfer items between different . The below code example, showcases a toolbar options in a . @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private string[] items = new string[] { "MoveUp", "MoveDown" }; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Position
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the position of toolbar in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            One of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.ToolBarPosition" /> enumeration. The default value is <c>Right</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            If the <c>ToolBarPosition</c> is <c>Left</c>, the toolbar will be positioned to the left of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            If the <c>ToolBarPosition</c> is <c>Right</c>, the toolbar will be positioned to the right of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </remarks>

TagHelpers.Name: Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox<TValue, TItem>
TagHelpers.Documentation: The ListBox component displays a list of items and allows users to select one or more items using a checkbox or keyboard selection. It includes features such as sorting, grouping, reordering, and drag-and-drop functionality for items. The type of the value returned by the selected item. The type of the items in the ListBox. The below code example, showcases a component. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private ListvehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]> The ListBox component displays a list of items and allows users to select one or more items using a checkbox or keyboard selection. It includes features such as sorting, grouping, reordering, and drag-and-drop functionality for items. The below code example, showcases a component. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]> The ListBox component displays a list of items and allows users to select one or more items using a checkbox or keyboard selection. It includes features such as sorting, grouping, reordering, and drag-and-drop functionality for items. The below code example, showcases a component. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]> The ListBox component displays a list of items and allows users to select one or more items using a checkbox or keyboard selection. It includes features such as sorting, grouping, reordering, and drag-and-drop functionality for items. The below code example, showcases a basic . @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } } ]]> The ListBox component displays a list of items and allows users to select one or more items using a checkbox or keyboard selection. It includes features such as sorting, grouping, reordering, and drag-and-drop functionality for items. The below code example, showcases a ListBox component. @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private ListvehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: TValue
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TValue for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: TItem
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the type of the type parameter TItem for the Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox<TValue, TItem> component.

BoundAttributes.Name: ChildContent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the child content for the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" /> including HTML element.
            If the child content is not specified, <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" /> is rendered using <c>DataSource</c> property.
            </summary>
            <value>
            The RenderFragment content. The default value is <c>null</c>.
            </value>
            <exclude />

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueExpression
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a lambda expression that identifies the bound value of property. The lambda expression that identifies the value bound to the Value property. By using this property and the event, two-way binding can be achieved instead of using @bind-Value. The below code example, showcases a basic . value )" ValueChanged="@((string[] v) => value = v)" DataSource="@vehicleData" TValue="string[]" TItem="ListItem"> @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowDragAndDrop
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop functionality is allowed in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if drag-and-drop functionality is allowed; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2.Scope" /> property is used to perform drag and drop between different <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: AllowFiltering
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether filtering is allowed in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if filtering is allowed; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2.FilterBarPlaceholder" /> property is used to show placeholder on the filter bar.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: CssClass
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the class/multiple classes separated by a space for the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" /> component. 
            </summary>
            <value>
            The CSS class string to customize the appearance of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />. The default value is an empty string.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnableRtl
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should display in Right-to-Left (RTL) direction.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the control should display in RTL direction; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Enabled
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" /> is enabled to interact with it.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the control is enabled; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: EnablePersistence
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component's state should be persisted across postbacks.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c> if the component's state should be persisted; otherwise, <c>false</c>. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            The <see cref="P:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2.Value" /> property is used to persist the component's state.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterBarPlaceholder
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets the placeholder text for the filter bar in the . The string value that represents the placeholder text for the filter bar in the . The default value is an empty string. This property will take into effect once the property is true. The below code example, showcases a filter bar place holder support in the . @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Height
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the height of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            A string value that represents the height of the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />. The default value is "".
            If the value is not specified, then the height will be calculated based on the entire list item's height.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            To add the suffix 'px' to the value if the height is fixed, for instance, '200px'.
            To add the suffix '%' to the value if the height is responsive, for instance, '200%'.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: MaximumSelectionLength
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the maximum length of items that can be selected in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>
            <value>
            An integer value that represents the maximum selection length. The default value is <c>500</c>.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Based on the limitation, list selection will be prevented.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: Scope
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Gets or sets a value that indicates the scope of the . A string value that represents the scope of the . The drag and drop operation and the toolbar interactions performed based on the value. The and is used to enable drag and drop as well as toolbar interactions in the . The below code example, showcases drag and drop support with scope property in the . @code{ private string scope= "combined-list"; private string[] items = new string[] { "MoveUp", "MoveDown", "MoveTo", "MoveFrom", "MoveAllTo", "MoveAllFrom" }; private List vehicleData1 = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } private List vehicleData2 = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "SSC Ultimate Aero", ID = "List-04" }, new ListItem { Text = "Koenigsegg CCR", ID = "List-05" }, new ListItem { Text = "McLaren F1", ID = "List-06" } } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: Value
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets a value that indicates the selected items in the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" />.
            </summary>

BoundAttributes.Name: ValueChanged
BoundAttributes.Documentation: An event callback that is triggered when the value of the component changes. An event callback function. By using this event and the property, two-way binding can be achieved instead of using @bind-Value. The below code example, showcases a . value )" ValueChanged="@((string[] v) => value = v)" DataSource="@vehicleData" TValue="string[]" TItem="ListItem"> @code{ private string[] value= new string[] { "List-01"}; private List vehicleData = new List{ new ListItem { Text = "Hennessey Venom", ID = "List-01"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Chiron", ID = "List-02"}, new ListItem { Text = "Bugatti Veyron Super Sport", ID = "List-03"} } public class ListItem { public string Text { get; set; } public string ID { get; set; } } } ]]>

BoundAttributes.Name: HtmlAttributes
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the additional attributes to be applied to the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" /> container element.
            </summary>
            <value>
            A collection of attributes to be added to the <see cref="T:Syncfusion.Blazor.DropDowns.SfListBox`2" /> container element.
            </value>
            <remarks>
            Additional attributes can be added by specifying as inline attributes or by specifying the <c>@attributes</c> directive.
            </remarks>

BoundAttributes.Name: ItemTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to each list item present in the popup.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: GroupTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to the group headers present in the popup list.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: NoRecordsTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template design and assigns it to popup list of component, when no data is available on the component.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ActionFailureTemplate
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the template and assigns it to the popup list content of the component, when the data fetch request from the remote server fails.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The template content. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: SortOrder
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Specifies the `SortOrder` to sort the data source.</para>
            <para>The available type of sort orders are.</para>
            <list type="bullet">
            <item>
            <term>None</term>
            <description>The data source is not sorting.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Ascending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with ascending order.</description>
            </item>
            <item>
            <term>Descending</term>
            <description>The data source is sorting with descending order.</description>
            </item>
            </list>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The order of sorting the list items. The default value is <c>SortOrder.None</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: DataSource
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            <para>Gets or sets the list items either through local or remote service and binds it to the component.</para>
            <para>It can be an array of JSON Objects or an instance of `DataManager`.</para>
            </summary>
            <value> 
            Binding data to the popup element. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Query
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the external `Query` that execute along with data processing.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            Query value to be used for data fetching. The default value is <c>null</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: FilterType
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets which filter type, the component needs to be considered on search action.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The filter type specifed for searching the list items. The default value is <c>FilterType.StartsWith</c>. 
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreCase
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether case-sensitivity is enabled or disabled when searching for suggestions.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>false</c>, consider the `case-sensitive` on performing the search to find suggestions. The default value is <c>true</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: IgnoreAccent
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets whether diacritic characters or accents are ignored.
            </summary>
            <value>
            <c>true</c>, ignores the diacritic characters or accents when filtering. The default value is <c>false</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: ZIndex
BoundAttributes.Documentation:
<summary>
            Gets or sets the z-index value of the component popup element.
            </summary>
            <value> 
            The ZIndex value for the popup element.The default value is <c>1000</c>.
            </value>

BoundAttributes.Name: Context
BoundAttributes.Documentation: Specifies the parameter name for all child content expressions.
